name: MEDIASET S.p.A.
goal: Founded in 1978, Mediaset S.p.A. is an integrated multi-platform TV operator (free/pay, linear and non-linear) and one of Europe’s most innovative multimedia production and distribution groups. Its core business is commercial television broadcasting in Italy and Spain. As of 31 December 2015, Mediaset’s total employees amounted to 5,484 (4,210 in Italy and 1,274 in Spain). Mediaset S.p.A. is listed on the Milan Stock Exchange since 1996, while Mediaset España is listed on the Ibex 35 since 2005.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Youth
